item.title: Infolab21 Vector Logo
item.description:
Update: I’ve been sent an offical vector version of the logo. So if you wish to stay consistent with the offical Infolab brand, please use this file instead.

While creating a poster I needed a high-res version of the InfoLab21 building logo, however I couldn’t find a suitable image. So I spent some time creating a vector version. Here are a few versions that people may find useful:

Visio 2003 – Scalable Vector Graphic – PDF – Small PNG – Large PNG
